titleStmt.title: Anterōtēmata Thomæ Draks Ten counter-demaunds propounded to those of the separation, (or English Donatists) to be directly, and distinctly answered.
titleStmt.author: Draxe, Thomas, d. 1618.

notesStmt.note: Caption title, first word in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
